classification.scene_description: The image is a 4-camera view of a daytime driving scene on a mixed residential-commercial road with active construction. The sky is partly cloudy with bright sunlight, and the road surface is dry. Road markings include yellow center lines and a "PFD" marking on the asphalt. Multiple vehicles are present: a silver sedan parked on the left, various moving vehicles including white sedans and trucks, and a construction excavator. The construction zone on the right side features orange safety vests on workers, traffic cones, barriers, and debris. Pedestrians include construction workers in the construction zone and a cyclist on the road. Traffic signals are visible in the distance, with the front telephoto view showing a traffic light. Surroundings include buildings, utility poles, and signs, indicating a developed area.
notable_elements: construction zone with excavator and barriers
pedestrians (workers and cyclist) on the street
